com.terremark
Class TerremarkFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.terremark.TerremarkFactory

public final class TerremarkFactory
extends Object

Factory that provider various utility methods. getClient(PropertiesBuilder) can be used to create an instance of TerremarkClient. getId(Reference) and getId(Resource) can be used to get a unique identifier for a reference or resource respectively.

Author:
Seshu Pasam

getClient

public static TerremarkClient getClient(PropertiesBuilder builder)
                                 throws TerremarkException,
                                        MalformedURLException
Returns an instance of Terremark client.

Parameters:
builder - Properties for creating the client instance.
Returns:
Terremark client instance.
Throws:
TerremarkException - If an error occurs while creating the Terremark client.
MalformedURLException - If the API end-point URL is malformed.
